title: 1955 in Norwegian football
text:
The 1955 season was the 50th season of competitive <a href="association%20football">football</a> in <a href="Norway">Norway</a>.
Hovedserien 1954/55.
Group A.
<onlyinclude></onlyinclude>
Group B.
<onlyinclude></onlyinclude>

June 5: Larvik Turn - Fredrikstad 4-2

Group Sørland/Vestland, A2.
5. Djerv 1919 14 6 1 7 21-27 13
Play-off Sørland/Vestland.
 Jerv - Bryne 2-2 (extra time)
 Bryne - Jerv 2-1
 Bryne - Varegg 2-3
Varegg promoted.
Play-off Møre/Trøndelag.
 Kvik - Kristiansund 4-0
 Kristiansund - Kvik 2-1 (agg. 2-5)
Kvik (Trondheim) promoted.

Relegation play-off District IV.

Holmestrand relegated
Norwegian Cup.
Third round.
 June 25: Lyn - Frigg 2-2 (extra time)
 June 26: Fredrikstad - Gjøvik/Lyn 4-0
 Asker - Storm 1-0
 Kapp - Brage 4-3
 Larvik Turn - Snøgg 5-1
 Pors - Sandefjord 2-4
 Odd - Drafn 5-1

 Lisleby - Vålerengen 3-2 (extra time)
 July 3: Nærbø - Viking 1-2
Rematch
 Frigg - Lyn 0-4
Fourth round.
August 20: Lillestrøm - Lyn 4-3
August 21: Fredrikstad - Varegg 8-1
 Skeid - Sverre 5-1

 Sandefjord - Kapp 5–0

Rematch

Quarterfinal.
 September 4: Asker - Fredrikstad 4-1
 Lillestrøm - Strømmen 1-0
 Skeid - Sandefjord 2-1
 Larvik Turn - Viking 1-2
Semifinal.
 October 3: Asker - Lillestrøm 0-1
 Viking - Skeid 1-2
Final.
 October 23: Skeid - Lillestrøm 5-0

 Line-ups:
